name: Fallingcers
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/857840/Jamping/?snr=1_5_1100__1100

Those who love platform games may think this is a simple game, but hardest platformers ever made. The hard part of the game is the impossibility of making no touch.
Play a little, or a lot -- there's wanna serious skill, so you can always get better and better. Fallingcers is a game that has enough bite-sized gameplay to last you a lifetime.

  • Key Features:

  • Level to infinity
  • Fall Forever.
  • Simple Design.
  • Simple Idea
  • Don't touch anywhere.
